special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy.
descriptions: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness.
descriptions: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy.
descriptions: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The sahuagin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:
* 1st level (4 slots): bless, detect magic, guiding bolt
* 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (trident)
* 3rd level (3 slots): mass healing word, tongues

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
